summary: A destitute ronin allies himself with an established clan, but its ruthless leader tries to turn him into a mindless killer.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Tatsuya Nakadai|Yukio Mishima|Yûjirô Ishihara|Mitsuko Baishô|Takumi Shinjo|Noboru Nakaya|Jin'ichirô Andô|Takeshi Date|Tatsuo Fujimori|Ren Fukuyama|Kin'ichi Hagimoto|Ken Hatano|Jirô Higashioo|Sôtarô Ibuki|Natsuko Kahara|Jun Katsumura|Kai Kenmoku|Eizô Kitamura|Kanae Kobayashi|Gen Kuroki|Shinsuke Mikage|Makoto Miyajima|Shinya Miyama|Kôjirô Miyamoto|Hajime Miyazawa|Ichirô Nakatani|Shôgen Nitta|Natsuko Oka|Jirô Sakagami|Ryôichi Satô|Akira Shimizu|Tsutomu Shimomoto|Yûsuke Takita|Kunie Tanaka|Ryutaro Tatsumi|Kei Yamamoto|Akira Yamauchi
title: Hitokiri
